Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
Thank you for your interest in the Mass Solar Connect program.
The Mass Solar Connect program has achieved unparalleled success as Direct Energy Solar contracted over 200 systems, far exceeding Mass Energy’s program goal.
Although the program has officially been closed by the Massachusetts Clean Energy Center, Direct Energy Solar is pleased to offer the reduced program pricing UNTIL SEPTEMBER 30 to all homeowners who signed up for a free solar consulation before August 31.
Please contact your Solar Consultant to move forward or call us at 800-903-6130.
Mass Energy Consumers Alliance <http://www.massenergy.org/>
Mass Solar Connect is a partnership between Massachusetts Clean Energy Center (MassCEC), Mass Energy Consumers Alliance (Mass Energy) and Direct Energy Solar.
Contact Us: 800-903-6130 Your Sun. Your Power. Your Way.
You’re receiving this email because you’ve expressed interest in Mass Solar Connect.
The Mass Solar Connect program is open to Mass Energy members and members of affiliated nonprofits. The enrollment period begins March 2, 2015 and lasts through August 31, 2015. Direct Energy Solar is pleased to offer the reduced program pricing until September 30, 2015 to all homeowners who signed up for a free solar consultation before August 31, 2015.
Offers and financing are not available in all areas. We customize our solar power system specifically for your home, therefore, pricing, savings, utility bill, solar bill amounts and actual returns vary based on different factors including but not limited to your location, system size, available solar incentives and local utility rates.
